title: 这是一篇测试文章
content:
# 哲学家｜苏格拉底

> 未经审视的人生不值得过

# 开心就笑，不开心就等一会儿再笑

> Laugh when you are happy and wait for a while when you are not

# 前边的风景很好看，我说的是别回头

> It's a beautiful view ahead I mean don't look back.

# 别频频回头了，回不去了就是回不去了

> Don't look back so often Not going back is not going back.

# 做自己喜欢的事，赚自己该赚的钱

> Do what you love and make what you need to make.

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

```bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

```bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

```bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

```bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

title: 内容页优化
content:
原稿各内容之间的关系也很清晰，只要在此逻辑基础上进行优化即可：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sia621mPkpWFz76Re1F7kJEficpmdeq9A0oo5MiaR1CGP3NQ3YKjibPRsCw%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

先来处理中间圆形区域，稍微分析可知，其内容大致可以分为这几项：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sVRlUKmvnAPvPKRp7OQZB268ptSKqueg8dmGSiaq3uW39iaYFMT4dbpuw%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

以圆形为基础，我们可以尝试分散环绕排版，像这样：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sMDQLteXqbD99OibmhHXws82nGXo5Qcv8m8PvJ3HRdibbTicKmzZibY5icDA%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

**其中的圆环是由两个不同大小的同心圆叠加而来**，小圆填充了蓝色渐变：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_gif%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2svibgwhbibFyibGMBIxxBkCdTia5AVAzgKibKErSZpFJgBGHQrtQyz0du6fA%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dgif>)

然后再插入三条线条，将大圆形均等分为三部分：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_gif%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sU839Z31g2cMQibib9PWBLibYic8nvgaj9KeEGmDHFKPGe9apLZwXZZRpww%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dgif>)

**而环绕弧形文字的制作呢，可借助文本效果-转换中的拱形工具实现。**

选中文本框，依次点击「形状格式」>「文本效果」>「转换」>「跟随路径」>「拱形」：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2soLWs5iaxXJVq2tV7UxiafcmZNSXJ2lsrJ1y8ByiaibF0UyWhWxQSTkPw3g%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

此时文本已经有弯曲的效果了：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2FlrKh7aZprqChEhMaEyWeHwAicLB9exBibCNwhJOaLxvx1LYNPruIia1r4FibZZTY6eqOFiadcnGAXWcQ01EibtOXm6Ow%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

然后我们将文本框的高度和宽度统一，让文字弧度贴合圆形的弧度，比如这里设置为 11 厘米：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sCp4QlxMUdnUECy4ia34icYwLdOYRsOetrY6v7I22BStK0vv3qLIqUJ9A%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

同样的方法，将其他两个文本转换弧化，然后分别与圆环居中对齐：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_gif%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2scRLr9e6zGUWyMJFVBEicwJA8T15Ed7XYVM6xibOwXYibFGfEdic3ia67krA%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dgif>)

这样分散环绕排版就完成了。

接下来两侧的内容，我们可以**用圆角矩形代替箭头，减少尖锐感：
**

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_gif%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2s6nPaibdU2UfSrzVrhYVLvxDM4pHuY4BWCaicEBKuHYSN1rddz9MCD2ug%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dgif>)

把 logo 和文字加上去看看效果，好像少了些向中心汇聚的趋势：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sg9bh6lKticOWEF37cNfK4XS5xWGOpu18s2Enqu7vbzOfA4I3Up3joXw%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

怎么办呢？

我们可以**加入一些细长的渐变圆角矩形，让两侧内容有种向内汇聚的趋势：
**

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_png%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sBiajOJiaicq2ibkmycQ7QxZslrhMsVHVX0JAhMn2BgNDRgnDYSrhicfhNQg%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dpng>)

最后加入动画，看看效果：

![](<https://cubox.pro/c/filters:no_upscale()?imageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fmmbiz.qpic.cn%2Fmmbiz_gif%2F4nk0mpbImbBPsCbXb6G3UicxY7KgS1r2sohLYWTPO3BUxudAaUWiconicFVP54RgwJmHCQgjjnY5tKD9ff7cp8Vag%2F640%3Fwx_fmt%3Dgif>)
